bioneuralnet.utils.logger

Functions

get_logger(name)

Retrieves a global logger configured to write to 'bioneuralnet.log' at the project root.
bioneuralnet.utils.logger.get_logger(name: str) → Logger[source]

Retrieves a global logger configured to write to ‘bioneuralnet.log’ at the project root.

Parameters:

name (str) – Name of the logger.

Returns:

Configured logger instance.

Return type:

logging.Logger
